text:
*Welcome to TradeIT, your simple exchange platform* 
There is no inventory and no accounts, meaning this is only harmless fun, more like little game.
 
*Valid commands:*
`products` will display currently available products.
`buy slack` will display all prices, for which you can buy product named `slack`.
`sell linux 100` will attempt to sell product named `linux` for a price of `100`.

attachments.text: Sometimes, almost randomly, you might see a timeout message. Just send your command again, please.

There is a market depth of 5, meaning on one side of the orderbook you can have up to 5 orders for each products. In case you send an order breaking this limit, the least relevant order in the book will be automatically deleted.
